about_the_game:
"The Citizens of Little Island are worried my young apprentice, my commitments imperatively forbid me to go to that lost island full of ignorant villagers to help them with their pathetic lives so I'm sending you, because I believe you are worthy of this task, do not thank me. "[/]

- Athakan, very kind grand magician of the court. -



Trade And Magic is a 3D, open world, Fantasy Shop simulator and Action Adventure Game that encourages you to explore, accumulate resources, indulge in crafting and create products to sell to Little Island travelers, so as to bring wealth to the island's villages. and make them grow, improving the shop you belong to and the services associated with it while you discover the secrets of the island with numerous events scattered around the map.
Whether the player is a child, a parent or an adult, the economic and social as well as moral teachings, seasoned with stylized graphics in an ironic / humorous context, makes Trade And Magic a highly accessible game, loved by both children and adults. larger.



Trade And Magic is a single developer's Indie product (for now) so your support and trust will not only be a nice gesture, but also an incentive to develop the game with a thousand other features including:

  • More Gathering zones and enemies
  • Bosses
  • XP And Spells Learning
  • Boxtron Upgrades
  • Multiplayer
  • Dungeon Crawling
  • Construction of villages
  • Defense of Villages
  • A rich history
  • Multiple choices
  • Countless mysteries to solve
  • Random world events
  • At least 40 hours of gameplay.

    If you had fun with the demo please buy the funder bundle to gain access to exclusive content at the moment of the game release.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX 4350 or Equivalent, Intel Core i3 6300 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ HD 7730, NVIDIA GeForce® GT 640
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Recommended:

  • Processor: Ryzen 5 CPU or Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R9 290, NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A humorous open-world, action-adventure fantasy with elements of RPG, crafting and store simulator, in stylized graphics, suitable for the whole family! Italian indie game under development, support the developer by buying the founder edition and receive customized Skins.
